name: An Evening With Strahd
description:
A traveler lost in a dark mysterious land finds themselves in a dark castle dining with their illustrious host Strahd Von Zarovich. This game was a project created for my players. This is a short little visual novel it was made for fun and as a reward for my wonderful player surviving Barovia. It was an emotional and exhilarating experience, and I am glad to have shared it with you.

We could extend it and add choices if people are interested. It could also have voice acted, with significantly more art added if people are interested. But as it stands t, this is an Evening With Strahd. 

Credits:
